description: Erection of sixty seven houses (ten 3-bedroomed terraced houses, four 3-bedroomed, twenty four 4-bedroomed & ten 5-bedroomed semi-detached houses, thirteen 4-bedroomed & six 5-bedroomed detached houses), in a mixture of two & three storey buildings with provision of garages and parking facilities (variation of phases 3 & 4a).
